# Reading files from naif-alsader/my_blog/
file1 = readLines("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/naif-alsader/my_blog/master/rtl_blog.css") 
file2  = readLines("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/naif-alsader/my_blog/master/rtl_rmk.css") 

# Creat new file for css 
file.create(paste0(here::here(),"/rtl_blog.css"))

# writing into rtl_blog
sink(paste0(here::here(),"/rtl_blog.css"))
cat("/* https://github.com/shamindras/ss_personal_distill_blog ,\n https://github.com/naif-alsader/my_blog */")
cat(file1,"\n ", sep = "\n")
cat(file2, sep = "\n" )
sink()
